name: Rebel Broadcast
description:
Game made for the Global Game Jam 2018 using the Godot game engine.

Pick up radios to place between buildings to make reach the rebel broadcast to the people. Buildings will change allegiance after some time listening the broadcast. You win after converting all buildings. If you are exposed to the guards or your radios are found the alert level will raise and if it reaches maximum level or if you are found next to a radio you will be caught and the game will be over.

https://github.com/ricargoes/RebelBroadcast

https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/rebel-broadcast

Controls:

WASD - Move character (Funky guy with green hair)

SPACE - Deploy previously picked up radio
